title: What are the top 10 events that drew the most Tweets Per Second? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are the top two Tweets that generated the most Retweets for  the year, plus honorable mentions for a few other Tweets that caught  attention around the world.  President  Obama comments on his reelection. Before he took the stage to affirm  his election victory, President Obama marked his win via Twitter. Within  hours, this Tweet simultaneously became the most retweeted of 2012 —  and the most retweeted ever, sent by people in more than 200 countries  around the world.810,000+ Retweets | 300,000+ Favorites  “RIP Avalanna. i love you”Justin  Bieber says goodbye to a fan Suffering from a rare form of brain  cancer, six-year-old Avalanna Routh was big Justin Bieber fan, and the  pop star had grown close to her during her illness. When she passed away  in September. Bieber paid tribute to her in a Tweet, and many, many  Twitter Beliebers responded.220,000+ retweets |100,000+ favorites  “Fuck it NFL.. Fine me and use the money to pay the regular refs.”Packer  TJ Lang voices his frustration In September the Seattle Seahawks went  head-to-head with the Green Bay Packers. The now-infamous final play was  called by a “replacement ref” due to a labor standoff with the  referees’ union. That call generated 1+ million Tweets as players and  fans flocked to Twitter to grouse about the decision. TJ’s Tweet became  the most retweeted of the night — and of the NFL season overall.98,000+ retweets|28,000+ favorites  “29  gold, 17 silver, 19 bronze – We finished 3rd in medal table after most  successful Olympics for 104 years #OurGreatestTeam RT your support”Team  GB congratulates its athletes For the first time since 1948, the Summer  Olympics returned to London. British athletes performed extremely well,  with a “home team” advantage resulting in more medals than expected.  Fans followed their every move, joining in at the close of the Games to  show their support for #OurGreatestTeam.67,000+ retweets | 5,000+ favorites  “…I  would like to announce here: I, Koichi Yamadera, have married Ms. Rie  Tanaka … I am really happy to have met such a great partner and have our  lives come together. We made up our minds to respect each other, help  each other and build a home full of smiles…”68,000 retweets 6,000 favorites
I believe Bin Laden's death was one, i know that 3,000 tweets were sent a second. Setting a record : Graph for data : http://flowingdata.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Osama-Bin-Laden-954x414.png
